column5: Has anyone stayed at wolf bay camp in Shiningtree, ontario? we would be fishing on shiningtree lake its between timmins and sudbury. if someone has some reviews for me it would be great
do a search on this site there are many posts about shiningtree and baywolf camp
Link didn't work Terry.. but yah.. type Shiningtree into the search function and it should keep you reading for the night.
yeah I noticed right away and changed the post but Wayne was too quick
thats what his wife say's too
I'm going up to shining tree camp 2nd week of June for the 1st time but I don't plan to catch any fish as most think if you can drive to it there can't be any fish.
